universum.studios.android.ui.util

Class ResourceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.util.ResourceUtils

  • public final class ResourceUtils
extends Object
    Utils providing compatibility support.

    Utility class that can be used to obtain a desired values from resources regardless the current Android version.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public static int getColor(@NonNull
                           Resources resources,
                           @ColorRes
                           int resId,
                           @Nullable
                           Resources.Theme theme)
                    throws Resources.NotFoundException
        Obtains color with the specified resId using the given resources.

        This utility method will obtain the requested color in a way that is appropriate for the current Android version.

        Parameters:
        resources - The resources that should be used to obtain the color.
        resId - Resource id of the desired color to obtain.
        theme - Theme that will be used to resolve theme attributes for the requested list on Build.VERSION_CODES#M and above Android versions.
        Returns:
        Instance of the requested color or 0 if the specified resource id is 0.
        Throws:
        Resources.NotFoundException
        See Also:
        Resources.getColorStateList(int, Resources.Theme), Resources.getColorStateList(int)

      • getColorStateList

        @Nullable
public static ColorStateList getColorStateList(@NonNull
                                                          Resources resources,
                                                          @ColorRes
                                                          int resId,
                                                          @Nullable
                                                          Resources.Theme theme)
                                                   throws Resources.NotFoundException
        Obtains color state list with the specified resId using the given resources.

        This utility method will obtain the requested color state list in a way that is appropriate for the current Android version.

        Parameters:
        resources - The resources that should be used to obtain.
        resId - Resource id of the desired color state list to be obtained.
        theme - Theme that will be used to resolve theme attributes for the requested list on Build.VERSION_CODES#M and above Android versions.
        Returns:
        Instance of the requested color state list or null if the specified resource id is 0.
        Throws:
        Resources.NotFoundException
        See Also:
        Resources.getColorStateList(int, Resources.Theme), Resources.getColorStateList(int)

      • getVectorDrawable

        @Nullable
public static Drawable getVectorDrawable(@NonNull
                                                    Resources resources,
                                                    @DrawableRes
                                                    int resId,
                                                    @Nullable
                                                    Resources.Theme theme)
                                             throws Resources.NotFoundException
        Obtains vector drawable with the specified resId using the given resources.

        This utility method will obtain the requested vector drawable in a way that is appropriate for the current Android version.

        Parameters:
        resources - The resources that should be used to obtain the vector drawable.
        resId - Resource id of the desired vector drawable to obtain.
        theme - Theme that will be used to resolve theme attributes for the requested drawable on Build.VERSION_CODES#LOLLIPOP and above Android versions.
        Returns:
        Instance of the requested vector drawable or null if the specified resource id is 0.
        Throws:
        Resources.NotFoundException
        See Also:
        getDrawable(Resources, int, Resources.Theme), VectorDrawableCompat.create(Resources, int, Resources.Theme)

public static Drawable getDrawable(@NonNull
                                              Resources resources,
                                              @DrawableRes
                                              int resId,
                                              @Nullable
                                              Resources.Theme theme)
                                       throws Resources.NotFoundException
        Obtains drawable with the specified resId using the given resources.

        This utility method will obtain the requested drawable in a way that is appropriate for the current Android version.

        Parameters:
        resources - The resources that should be used to obtain the drawable.
        resId - Resource id of the desired drawable to obtain.
        theme - Theme that will be used to resolve theme attributes for the requested drawable on Build.VERSION_CODES#LOLLIPOP and above Android versions.
        Returns:
        Instance of the requested drawable or null if the specified resource id is 0.
        Throws:
        Resources.NotFoundException
        See Also:
        Resources.getDrawable(int, Resources.Theme), Resources.getDrawable(int)

      • dpToPixels

        public static int dpToPixels(@NonNull
                             Resources resources,
                             float dp)
        Converts the specified density independent pixels value into pixels using density obtained from the given resources.
        Parameters:
        resources - The application resources used to access current device's density.
        dp - The desired density independent pixels value to convert to raw pixels.
        Returns:
        Converted value in pixels rounded via Math.round(float).
        See Also:
        DisplayMetrics.density
